factorio_path: Path to Factorio root folder. Example : /opt/factorio
username: Your Username here. See README -> Username and token
service_name: The name of the service used to start Factorio
alternative_glibc_directory: Path to folder where glibc is installed. Eg: /opt/glibc-2.18 (see README -> On the error version `GLIBC_2.18' not found)
alternative_glibc_version: Version of glibc in the 'alternative_glibc_directory'. Eg: 2.18 (see README -> On the error version `GLIBC_2.18' not found)
